title: Add Privacy Policy page for Rankawat Web Solutions

requirements.text: Create a new frontend page at route "/privacy-policy" that displays the provided Privacy Policy content for "Rankawat Web Solutions" with a clear page title and section headings, and set "Last Updated" to "05 Feb 2026".

quotes: Last Updated: [date daal sakte ho â€“ jaise 05 Feb 2026]

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /privacy-policy renders a Privacy Policy page.
The page includes the company name "Rankawat Web Solutions" and shows "Last Updated: 05 Feb 2026".

The page includes the 8 sections reflected in the user-provided policy (Information We Collect, How We Use Your Information, Data Security, Cookies Policy, Third-Party Services, User Rights, Changes to This Privacy Policy, Contact Us).
The page includes the provided contact details: Mobile: 76910 29526 and Email: rankawatwebsolutions09@gmail.com.
Content is presented in English (user-facing text on this page is English).

requirements.text: Add a "Privacy Policy" navigation entry in the site footer quick links that routes to "/privacy-policy".
acceptanceCriteria: Footer "Quick Links" includes a "Privacy Policy" link/button.
Clicking "Privacy Policy" navigates to /privacy-policy without a full page reload.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Do not implement any backend storage or API changes for the Privacy Policy.
Do not add third-party analytics, cookie banners, or consent-management tooling as part of this change.
